rules_text:
When Marquis Vaasco de Moraes enters, you may return target non-Zombie creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Legacy {R}{W}{B}

special_text2:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
Sacrifice a creature or Marquis Vaasco de Moraes.
You gain 3 life.
If The Grand Revival would be put into exile this turn, instead exile it, then return it to the battlefield. [i](Front face up.)[/i]
Exile The Grand Revival, then return it to the battlefield.
